actions.name: Cud Chew

cost.trigger: The user consumed a [Food] item in its last 5 Activations.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user consumed a [Food] item in its last 5 Activations.

Effect: The user freely gains the effect of their last consumed [Food] item a second time.
